import React from "react"; import blog1 from "../images/blog1.jpg"; import "../stylesheet/blogDetail.scss"; import MetaTags from "react-meta-tags"; export default function steps_to_get_started_with_amazon_india_in_2021() { return (
4 steps to get your first sell on amazon India in 2021

4 steps to get your first sell on amazon India in 2021{" "}

I dont have to go to the customer, the customer comes to me

This is a quote from amazon India's official website. And its true nowadays crores of customers shopping on amazon with recent figures to be more than 100 million.

Just look back into your past and imagine how many times you placed an order on Amazon or some other online marketplace or how many times you checked the price online before buying products from the store.

Shocked?

Thats the reality. Young millennias prefer online marketplaces to traditional stores and these millennias are working professionals having busy lives and very little time and a lot of money. Money thats where we are interested in right? So to the point what you need to start your online business on amazon

You have to follow these 4 steps to get your first sell{" "}

  1. Register account on amazon
    {" "}

    For registering an account on amazon you need the following documents

    • Goods and services tax no
    • Pan Card
    • Active bank account to receive money

    {" "} Once you register you will get access to a dashboard that will help you list products to sell

  2. Upload your listing

    The second step is to upload your listing provided you have a product to sell in the first place. You dont have a product to sell dont worry we will guide you on how to find the best product to sell on amazon.

    Now assuming you have a product to sell the next step is to create a listing We are not going into details on how to create a listing that will be covered here

    So to create a listing you need to write a catchy title Then add images and description and last add price And hit publish It will take little time to make your listing active once it is it will show in your dashboard You are good to go now

  3. Advertise your product

    So whatever product you sell there is the possibility that a thousand others might be selling the same product and you likely end up at bottom of the search result

    That means visibility of your product will be very low initially

    So to overcome this we need to advertise to get few sales to boost organic ranking

    {" "}

    Now warning here is without reviews it will be very hard to get sell even with advertising. So it is best to get a few reviews from your friends and families provided they are not connected to you on Facebook. Amazon will delete a review if someone who is connected to you posts it so better find someone who is not connected to you on social media who may be friend of a friend So with a few initial reviews, you are good to go or advertising

  4. Dispatch your first order.

    Considering everything goes as planned you will likely see your first order soon. Be ready to dispatch with amazon courier service

Thats it, guys. This is not a detailed post but an overview on how you can start selling on amazon. To go into details you can click on links provided in particular point to know more

Conclusion

2021 is the right time to start selling on amazon and earn some extra income. And if you are lucky and found few products that are selling you are going to be earning more than your full-time job

); }
